title: Completion Modelling For Series A Fundraising
description: Drive visibility and engagement for a conference uniting thinkers, activists, and academics critiquing techno-feudalism—the consolidation of power by digital platforms and algorithmic systems. I’ll design and execute a multi-channel campaign (social, newsletters, media outreach, partnerships) to highlight the urgency of these conversations and attract the right audience. Attendees can expect a thought-provoking event positioned as both intellectually rigorous and culturally relevant.

milestones.title: Phase One: Test
milestones.description: Bring Gotham’s edge to the stage—I’ll craft and run a full event marketing campaign for “The Philosophy of Absolute Batman” that turns casual fans into ticket-holders. From sharp creative assets and targeted ads to campus and community outreach, I’ll build anticipation and keep RSVPs climbing
